ygData.subject: Apology
ygData.msgSnippet: All, I m sorry for the multiple posts today. :-(  I was posting from my web-browser connection at work and it kept giving me an error message. I tried 4 times
ygData.messageBody:
All,

I'm sorry for the multiple posts today. :-( I was posting from my
web-browser connection at work and it kept giving me an error message.
I tried 4 times to send it out and then gave up. Imagine my chagrin
when I came home, downloaded my email and found out I had sent it to the
list 4 or 5 times! I am so embarrassed! Anyways, I just wanted to say
"sorry" for spamming the list.

Safe travels,
Wynsong

--
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Expand in consciousness-
be ready to accept anything now,
at any time. --Eileen Caddy
